title: Michael Zezas: Inside the Municipal Bond Liquidity Trap
description: When markets get volatile, strange things start to happen in markets you might not expect. That's both a sign of stress, and in some cases, a sign of opportunity.
itunes:title: Michael Zezas: Inside the Municipal Bond Liquidity Trap
itunes:summary: When markets get volatile, strange things start to happen in markets you might not expect. That's both a sign of stress, and in some cases, a sign of opportunity.
